prompt: A macro, extreme close-up shot of a 1/2 oz gold bar resting on a highly detailed, textured scale. Focus on the intricate details of the gold bar, including any markings, serial numbers, or imperfections. The scale should be partially visible, emphasizing the precision of weighing precious metals. Lighting should be soft and diffused, highlighting the bar's luster and the scale's texture. Shallow depth of field with the focus on the gold bar. Photorealistic, high-resolution. --ar 16:9 --style raw --zoom 1.2
name: how-much-is-a-1-2-oz-of-gold-worth-image-1.png

prompt: An elegant composition featuring a 1/2 oz American Gold Eagle coin displayed alongside a modern smartphone showing a stock market chart fluctuating in real-time. The coin should be positioned slightly in front of the phone, with the chart blurred in the background. The overall tone is professional and informative. The lighting is warm and inviting, with a subtle reflection of the screen on the coin's surface. The background is a clean, dark surface. Photorealistic, studio lighting. --ar 16:9 --style raw
name: how-much-is-a-1-2-oz-of-gold-worth-image-2.png

prompt: A split-screen image. On the left, a close-up of molten gold being poured into a mold in an industrial setting. Sparks and heat shimmer in the air. On the right, a finished 1/2 oz gold bar sits on a velvet cushion, reflecting ambient light. The contrast between the raw process and the refined product is emphasized. The lighting on the left is hot and intense, while the lighting on the right is soft and luxurious. Photorealistic, dramatic lighting. --ar 16:9 --style raw --zoom 1.1
name: how-much-is-a-1-2-oz-of-gold-worth-image-3.png

prompt: A wide-angle shot of a busy trading floor, with multiple screens displaying financial data and traders actively working. In the foreground, slightly out of focus, a hand holds a protective case containing a 1/2 oz gold coin. The composition emphasizes the connection between the physical asset and the digital marketplace. The lighting is bright and energetic, reflecting the fast-paced environment. Photorealistic, dynamic composition. --ar 16:9 --style raw
name: how-much-is-a-1-2-oz-of-gold-worth-image-4.png

prompt: A conceptual image depicting a 1/2 oz gold coin partially submerged in water. The water should be clear and still, creating a mirror-like reflection of the coin. The background is a blurred, abstract representation of global currency symbols. This image symbolizes the stability and value of gold in an uncertain financial environment. The lighting is soft and ethereal, creating a sense of calm and security. Photorealistic, artistic interpretation. --ar 16:9 --style raw --zoom 1.3
name: how-much-is-a-1-2-oz-of-gold-worth-image-5.png
